name: Hermit
dialogue:
What are you doing here?
OPTIONS: [1] How can I cross the river? [2] I need food. [3] Walk away

responses.1: You must find a rope to cross the river.
responses.2: Scram, I'm not sharing my food with you.
responses.3: Bye! I didn't want to help you anyway

name: Trader
dialogue:
Welcome to Village 2, I am the most well-traveled trader. What can I do for you?
Options [1] I need a potion to cure my sister [2] I'm low on supplies, do you have any food? [3] EXIT

responses.1:
You are in luck. I have the potion you are searching for.
Type take potion to add it to your inventory.
responses.2:
I have only a small slice of bread.
Type take bread to add it to you inventory.
responses.3: Come back and visit if you need anything else.

name: Bartender
dialogue:
Welcome to the Tavern. It looks like you are setting out on a long journey. How can I help?
OPTIONS: [1] I'd like come ale. [2] Do you have anything to eat? [3] Walk out

responses.2: Here is some bread for your journey.
